code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Regraschat from'./Regraschat';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const[showRegraschat,setShowRegraschat]=useState(true);const[mensagemUsuario,setMensagemUsuario]=useState('');const[response,setResponse]=useState('');const hideRegraschat=()=>{setShowRegraschat(false);};const handleMensagemChange=e=>{setMensagemUsuario(e.target.value);};const handleKeyDown=e=>{if(e.key==='Enter'&&!e.shiftKey){e.preventDefault();handleEnviarClick();}};const handleEnviarClick=()=>{console.log('Mensagem enviada:',mensagemUsuario);axios.post("http://localhost:3000/chat",{mensagemUsuario}).then(res=>{setResponse(res.data);}).catch(err=>{console.error("Erro na requisi√ß√£o:",err.response||err);});setMensagemUsuario('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"home-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("center",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Aprenda Franc\xEAs com IA \uD83E\uDD16"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{id:"orangeguy",src:require('./images/orangeguy.png'),alt:"Orange Guy"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-area",children:showRegraschat?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Regraschat,{onClose:hideRegraschat}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"msg-inicio",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Bem vindo!
